scenario_text.value: This place is pretty...depressing, huh.
You said, it Saki.
Aren’t you scared, Professor?

I’d say I’m more...nervous than scared.
There’s something I must do, after all...

Yeah... Me, I’m scared... My teeth have been
chattering for a while now.
Saki...
What should I say to Saki and the Professor?
Just get it in gear!
This isn’t like you.
Stop whining!
Just get your butt in gear, Saki!

Spoken like a typical guy... You think that’s
enough to help me conquer my fear?

Well, Takuma’s words have merit. Moving
activates your metabolism, then your brain—

Come oooooon, that’s not the part I’m talking
about!
This isn’t like you, Saki.

Yeah, you’re right... Okay!
Back to normal... I’ll go back to normal!

Good one, Saki. Self-suggestion is very
effective in situations such as this.

You would say that, wouldn’t you, Professor.
Still, I admit I do feel better.

Stop whining, Saki! A battle could break out
any minute here.
Huh?! Oh, uh...sorry, Takuma. You’re right.

Now, now, Takuma... Everyone’s on edge, and
Saki can’t help how she feels.
Oh... Is that...?
What is it, Professor?
I think I see a path up ahead.
Really?
Yes, over here. Come, follow me.
